name: Cosmic Games
description:
Cosmic Games

This project was created as part of Unity's "Creative Core" Pathway in order to demonstrate successful implementation of various features including:

  • Baked and Realtime Lighting
  • VFX
  • Animation
  • Diegetic and Non-Diegetic Audio
  • Multiple Cameras
  • Post Processing
  • And UI to customize all of the above features!

Before

After

Usage and Installation

  1. Unzip 'Cosmic Games.zip' to desired location and run 'Cosmic Games.exe' from within the new folder.
  2. Create the mood by using the 'Settings' menu to alter:
    • Lighting
    • Audio
    • VFX
    • Post Processing
  3. Try cranking up the music volume to maximum and making the clerk dance in time!

Controls

  • ESC to toggle between menu and first person perspective
  • KEYPAD 1-4 to change camera views
  • WASD to move
  • MOUSE to look
  • RMB to zoom
  • E / R to make clerk dance
  • L CTRL to crouch
  • L SHIFT to walk briskly
